It tool a data leak,and a year later I finally found out how they were getting in . comment.body:
У вас выключена фильтрация HTTPS, поэтому на сайте отображается реклама как если бы вы открыли его без AdGuard.
Включите эту фильтрацию в настройках программы, в фильтрах оставьте только наши (конфигурация ниже), обновите их, откройте сайт.
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Mobile Ads
AdGuard URL Tracking
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Annoyances
AdGuard Russian
```

comment.body:
Regarding issues with AdGuard for Safari extension (like this one - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/162262#issuecomment-1827473792), please try to update extension to the latest version - 1.11.16.

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/162262#issuecomment-1826796115 and other similar issues - please check with all other extensions disabled. As far as I know, Malwarebytes Browser Guard also block ads and it may cause detection.

comment.body:
Niestety nie potrafię tego odtworzyć.

<hr>

Odnośnie pierwszego zgłoszenia - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/167191#issue-2011094750 - to zostalo naprawione jakiś tydzień temu. Upewnij się proszę, że listy filtrów są zaktualizowane.

<hr>

Jeśli chodzi o drugi problem - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/167191#issuecomment-1826869138 - to również proszę zaktualizuj filtry, wyczyść dane witryny (pamięć podręczną oraz ciasteczka), uruchom ponownie przeglądarkę, a następnie sprawdź proszę, czy problem nadal występuje.

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end. Try to update the AdGuard for Safari to version `1.11.16`, then leave only AdGuard filters without any custom ones, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
The issue is caused by `Fanboy's Social Blocking List` . Please disable this filter or add:
```
40ton.net#@#.td-post-sharing-bottom
40ton.net#@#.td-post-sharing-top
```
to the User Rules.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

iWan Advertisement in the lower right corner of the channel page

Game advertisement in the lower right corner of the video playback page.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/25147395/bb208bdd-1cb6-4429-ab92-2ba9cc6d83f8)

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/25147395/47f9c2ba-f90e-4f01-9c7a-c7f955847922)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://sklep.natko.pl/blog/wpis/wlasciwosci-czarnuszki-egipskiej-i-jej-prozdrowotne-cechy/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsklep.natko.pl%2Fblog%2Fwpis%2Fwlasciwosci-czarnuszki-egipskiej-i-jej-prozdrowotne-cechy%2F) ### Comment > Zarządzaj zgodami plików Cookie > Poniżej możesz zmienić ustawienia plików cookies naszych i naszych partnerów. Więcej na temat zbierania danych przez pliki cookie naszych partnerów znajdziesz w polityce dotyczącej cookies Google. Korzystanie przez nas z plików cookie analitycznych oraz marketingowych wymaga Twojej zgody. W ramach cookies marketingowych wydzieliliśmy kategorię plików cookie związanych z wyświetlaniem reklam w związku z korzystaniem ze stron internetowych (reklamowe pliki cookie) oraz plików cookie pozwalających na docieranie do Ciebie ze spersonalizowaną reklamą w portalach społecznościowych (pliki cookie mediów społecznościowych). > > Więcej informacji o poszczególnych kategoriach plików cookie, które stosujemy w serwisie, znajdziesz poniżej. Jeżeli chcesz zaakceptować wszystkie pliki cookie, kliknij „Zaakceptuj wszystkie”. Jeżeli natomiast chcesz, żebyśmy stosowali tylko niezbędne pliki cookie, kliknij „Zaakceptuj wybrane i zapisz”. Aby zmieniać preferencje plików cookie, przesuń suwak przy wybranej kategorii. Masz prawo do wglądu w swoje ustawienia oraz do ich zmiany w dowolnym czasie. Korzystanie z plików cookie wiąże się z przetwarzaniem Twoich danych osobowych dotyczących Twojej aktywności w serwisie. > > Szczegółowe informacje o sposobie, w jaki my oraz nasi partnerzy używamy plików cookie oraz przetwarzamy Twoje dane, a także o przysługujących Ci prawach, znajdziesz w naszej Polityce Cookies. ### Screenshots

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

The promotion items in the left navigation bar of Tencent Video have been deleted, which usually include jump links to Tencent iwan Game Center.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/25147395/b2e65cb8-657f-45fa-870c-3d4fc7832963)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

Desktop

AdGuard Browser Extension

4.2.209

Firefox (121 beta)

Desktop

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter

_No response_

AdGuard Turkish filter

_No response_

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.209

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox (121 beta)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://youtube.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter
[see the attached configuration for a full list of filters and other settings](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/files/13467407/20231123_143132_adg_ext_settings_4.2.209.json)

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Turkish filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Open a livestream in the watch view

2. Try to post superchar/super sticker/super thanks, click send

3.  Observe the payment request is blocked

From the browser inspector: 

scheme
	`https`
host
	`www.gstatic.com`
filename
	`/_/billing/_/js/{unique.id}`

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: AdGuard filters interfere with sending YouTube superchats.

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.209

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox (121 beta)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://youtube.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter
[see the attached configuration for a full list of filters and other settings](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/files/13467407/20231123_143132_adg_ext_settings_4.2.209.json)

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Turkish filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Open a livestream in the watch view

2. Try to post superchar/super sticker/super thanks, click send

3.  Observe the payment request is blocked

From the browser inspector: 

scheme
	`https`
host
	`www.gstatic.com`
filename
	`/_/billing/_/js/{unique.id}`
 


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @Alex-302 Cannot be reported using the AdGuardBot flow as Super Chats require login and a screenshot is not enough to describe, I had to open the inspector to find out that payment requests were in fact blocked by AdGuard.

comment.body:
I guess that something like this:
```adblock
||twitter.com^$csp=worker-src 'none'
```
could be used as a workaround.
But I'm not sure if it will not cause breakage and it also requires to unregister currently registered service worker (it's regarding - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166718#issuecomment-1824776358).

pull_request.title: Sorted some mishaps in the LV and LT sections
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

In relation to https://github.com/EasyList-Lithuania/easylist_lithuania/pull/26#issuecomment-1818342187, I took a look at https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/BaseFilter/sections/foreign.txt, noticed `delfi.lv` entries in the Lithuanian section, and thought "Wait, that can't be right?"

So I attempted to place various entries for at least 6 sites into the correct sections. 🌞

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

*De facto* https://github.com/EasyList-Lithuania/easylist_lithuania/pull/26

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/EasyList-Lithuania/easylist_lithuania/pull/26

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

 <details>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/22780683/f7ff500e-dfb2-430d-80d6-3af7273655bd)

</details>

(The Linguist linter seems a bit broken this week, but you'll get the gist of it.)

2. Your comment

Some .lv entries are incorrectly placed in the Lithuanian section, while many .lt entries are incorrectly placed in the Latvian section.

comment.body:
> @Br1ckl У меня не работает, ругается на ВПН за пределами России. Можете проверить, включена или выключена фильтрация HTTPS для этого приложения в Apps Management? Если включена - попробуйте выключить. Сертификат в системное хранилище скопирован?

Проблема решилась (видимо, с обновлением фильтров). Приложение заработало с включённым Adguard (даже с фильтрацией HTTPS). Сертификат установлен. Спасибо.

> @catfaceingeometricshapes I don't see expand button in Safari. In Chrome it works.

You don't have the icon that's little, with a transparent dark-grey rounded square, behind two white angled brackets, displayed diagonally, on the top right corner of every Youtube video result, that I pointed to with a turquoise arrow in "Screenshot 1"?

I've had Adguard disabled in the meantime. Now that you replied I re-enabled it and both of these issues are gone, things seem to be working as before.

All good at the moment 👌

On Mon, 27 Nov 2023 at 18:07, Alex ***@***.***> wrote:

> @catfaceingeometricshapes <https://github.com/catfaceingeometricshapes>
>
> You don't have the icon that's little, with a transparent dark-grey
> rounded square, behind two white angled brackets, displayed diagonally, on
> the top right corner of every Youtube video result, that I pointed to with
> a turquoise arrow in "Screenshot 1"?
>
> Yes, in Safari only.
>
> I've had Adguard disabled in the meantime. Now that you replied I
> re-enabled it and both of these issues are gone, things seem to be working
> as before.
>
> So all good now?

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
